page.title: 19PRIMARY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Our work is normally writing, Maths, Science, History or Geography. On Mondays we read for quite a long time. I like reading in the hall and watching television. At playtime some children play football in the playground or on the field. I practise cartwheels or play touch. We have swimming in the school pool twice a week. In summer we play rounders and cricket, but in winter the games are football and netball. I like building with meccano and drawing. At 3p.m. each day our class listens to a story. We have singing every week and some children play recorders and other musical instruments in the school orchestra. We use the computer for our work sometimes.
